description: This file is a JavaScript module that defines underscore templating functions, initializes Google Analytics, and includes functions for fetching files and issues, as well as a Learn class for dynamic content insertion related to the TodoMVC project.

classes.name: Learn
classes.description: A class for dynamically loading and displaying project information and issue counts, with methods for appending content and fetching issue data.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.append
methods.description: Inserts a dynamically generated aside element into the document body, based on a template and configuration.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.fetchIssueCount
methods.description: Fetches the number of open issues from GitHub API and updates the DOM accordingly.
